metadata.title: Why Doesn't the ON Judgment Occur When Touched?

sections.content:
Question:
Why doesn't the ON judgment occur when touching the electrode?
Answer:
The threshold value may be set high.
Check the change in touch ONOFF on the "Cap Touch(QE) Monitor" of QE for Capacitive Touch and adjust the threshold.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
